Reference.title: Reference
Reference.description: Reference ID for this specified type in this project (e.g. type 'A-1').

Status.title: Status
Status.description: Status of the element, predominately used in renovation or retrofitting projects. The status can be assigned to as "New" - element designed as new addition, "Existing" - element exists and remains, "Demolish" - element existed but is to be demolished,  "Temporary" - element will exists only temporary (like a temporary support structure).

NumberOfRows.title: NumberOfRows
NumberOfRows.description: Number of tube rows in the tube bundle assembly.

NumberOfCircuits.title: NumberOfCircuits
NumberOfCircuits.description: Number of parallel fluid tube circuits.

FoulingFactor.title: FoulingFactor
FoulingFactor.description: Fouling factor of the tubes in the tube bundle.

ThermalConductivity.title: ThermalConductivity
ThermalConductivity.description: The thermal conductivity of the tube.

Length.title: Length
Length.description: Length of the tubes in the tube bundle.

Volume.title: Volume
Volume.description: Total volume of fluid in the tubes and their headers.

NominalDiameter.title: NominalDiameter
NominalDiameter.description: Nominal diameter or width of the tubes in the tube bundle.

OutsideDiameter.title: OutsideDiameter
OutsideDiameter.description: Actual outside diameter of the tube in the tube bundle.

InsideDiameter.title: InsideDiameter
InsideDiameter.description: Actual inner diameter of the tube in the tube bundle.

HorizontalSpacing.title: HorizontalSpacing
HorizontalSpacing.description: Horizontal spacing between tubes in the tube bundle.

VerticalSpacing.title: VerticalSpacing
VerticalSpacing.description: Vertical spacing between tubes in the tube bundle.

HasTurbulator.title: HasTurbulator
HasTurbulator.description: TRUE if the tube has a turbulator, FALSE if it does not.
